outputs.output_descr: The project builds on the achievements of the "Strengthening Disaster Risk Management in Timor-Leste" project (2011-2013).   It aims towards helping the Government of Timor-Leste to strengthen its DRM capacity, enhance preparedness and reduce risks through (1) establishment of the institutional and legal systems for DRM; (2) Increasing community capacities for disaster preparedness and effective response; (3) support the establishment and operationalization of an end-to-end early warning system.; and (4) enhancing the capacities within the country for better early recovery planning.

project_descr: Reduce the risks of natural disasters and climate change through promoting scientific information, and strengthening national, district and community-level capacity for prevention/ mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.
